title: Migrants break out of Hungarian camp; ‘tens of millions’ may arrive in Europe
content:
Source: Storyful - 5 days ago 
Migrants Break Free From Camp in Hungary's Roszke  02:08 Several migrants broke free from a camp in Hungary’s Roszke, on the border with Serbia, on August 29 by climbing over the camp’s fence. The migrants were pursued by police who captured and detained three of them, according to RFE/RL. Thousands of migrants have made the perilous journey to Europe...
